name: ProPresenter Playlist File
summary: Learn about .PRO4PL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can export a playlist in ProPresenter by right-clicking the playlist in the Playlist pane and choosing "Export Playlist."
NOTE: PRO4PL files are compatible between Mac and Windows versions of ProPresenter.

description: Multimedia playlist created by ProPresenter, a program used for creating church worship service presentations; saves an XML playlist of audio, video, and .PRO4 files but does not include the referenced files (use .PRO4PLX files to include the audio and video files in the bundle); used for transferring presentations outlines between computers.
